job.title: Site Reliability Engineer
job.description: Client- Established Financial organizationTitle: Site Reliability Engineer - Kubernetes.Length: Direct hireLocation: Jersey City, NJ or Dallas, TX. Hybrid 2-3 days office, rest WFH.SUMMARY:We are looking for a Container migration SRE, who understands the enterprise containers in Docker Swarm to advanced Kubernetes platforms (OpenShift, Tanzu) deployments and has prior experience with container migrations and deployments. The container migration SRE will bring in Kubernetes deployment with software engineering SRE standard methodologies. This role will be instrumental in continuing our Container First strategy delivery, bringing expertise with, development, and implementation of container migration projects.YOUR PRIMARY RESPONSIBILITIES:Lead the container platform ecosystemCluster capacity management and provisioning through automation of underlying hosts.Understanding the infrastructure components (server, network, storage, firewall, load balancer etc) required for Kubernetes platform, Infrastructure As a Code(IaC).[Developer Differentiator]Experience with a modern application software language; especially a systems programming language (Go, Python)Understanding of architectural patterns; Microservices are important, but experience with other patterns helpfulPractitioner of version control; experience with different branching strategies (and understands why GitFlow is not a good choice for CI/CD and enterprise development teams)Understands and uses unit and functional testing; ideally advocates tests up front (advocates tests for moving faster)Experience defining delivery pipelines; demonstrable work in automation and observability (Bonus points for experience using GitOps for deployment)Understand K8s resiliency patterns (HPA, self-healing)Understands container image optimizationQUALIFICATIONS:Minimum of 6 years of related experienceBachelor's degree requiredKubernetes and/or Tanzu or OpenShift Container Platform.Kubernetes and PythonExpertise in Tanzu Solutions As A Service OfferingsExperience delivering infrastructure as code using CI/CD practicesProven track record of applying technology to tackle business problems.Experience with migrate/onboard application onto KubernetesAWS associate certifications or higher preferredRedHat certifications in Linux and OpenShift administration preferred
